DOC.brief_summary: A clinical trial to determine the effectiveness and safety of AUY922 compared to other drugs known to be effective against gastric cancer in second line therapy for patients who have failed one line of chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Trial of AUY922 vs. Comparators in Advanced Gastric Cancer
